page.title: 15TRADE IN NORTH BRENT
page.content: The {shops} in this area are generally located around the {railway stations} and {major road junctions.} The shops are often arranged in 'parades', built when the housing estates were established in the 1930's. . Such shopping areas are along Kenton Road, Preston Road, Watford Road, East Lane in Sudbury, East Lane near North Wembley station, along the Kingsbury Road and near Wembley Park Station. Local shops usually include small supermarkets, butchers, a post office, estate agent's, a few banks, hairdresser, greengrocery, ironmongers and newsagents.To shop in a large { {department store} people must travel to Wembley Central, Harrow, Brent Cro0ss or Watford. At North Wembley there is an {industrial estate} which includes the long-established G.E.C./Osram factory,and others.
